snippet.title: Blades of Time: E3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab your gunsword and get ready to hunt for treasure in this trailer for the new acton game Blades of Time.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
